<script>
  var bubbles = d3.selectAll(".bubble");
  function repeat() {
    bubbles.each(function(d, i) {
         d3.select(this)
           .transition()
           .duration(3000)
           .style("fill",d3.rgb( Math.random()*255,Math.random()*255,Math.random()*255 ))
           .on("end", repeat);  // when the transition finishes start again
    });
  }
  repeat();
</script>
